Researcher Sheldon Cohen at Carnegie Mellon University studies the role of stress.
We know quite a bit about stress and susceptibility to infection.

In one study, Cohen and his collaborators interviewed 400 healthy adults, about how stressed out they are.

After we administered the questionnaires, we exposed the people in the study to one of five different viruses that cause the common cold.
